definition: to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
to be born/(fig.) to develop out of sth else (of ideas, stories, political systems etc)/(fig.) to shed one's body (to be reborn)/bodiless (e.g. lacquerware)
to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
fetus dies in the belly/(fig.) plans or projects failed before being carried out

sentences.english: The invention relates to a rubber tube tyre jointly born by a tyre tube and a tyre cover.
sentences.chinese: 本發明是一種內外胎聯合承載的膠管輪胎。

sentences.english: The back tyre of my bicycle is down.
sentences.chinese: 我的自行車後胎沒氣了。

sentences.english: In this case, your baby’s heart rate will be checked periodically with a Doppler.
sentences.chinese: 這時將會使用多普勒胎心儀來定期監控寶寶的胎心率。

sentences.english: The glaze of blue and white porcelain is transparent and the base is thin and light.
sentences.chinese: 這種瓷的釉質透明如水，胎體質薄輕巧。

sentences.english: Today we tested some new front tyres, finding a good direction.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們測試了一些新前胎，找到對的方向。

sentences.english: The car with a flat tire is being handled by traffic police.
sentences.chinese: 交警正在處理那輛車胎沒氣的汽車。

sentences.english: 44As soon as the sound of your greeting reached my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你問安的聲音一入我耳，我腹裏的胎就歡喜跳動。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic Doppler baby's heart instrument is one of important means for clinical diagnostic.
sentences.chinese: 超聲多普勒胎心儀超聲源是臨牀診斷的重要手段之一。

sentences.english: The production of PET elastomeric yarns was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 紹了子午胎簾子布用滌綸彈力緯紗的製造技術。

sentences.english: Several teratoma strains with different differentiation have been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 獲得了分化程度不同的一組畸瘤胎。

sentences.english: Eliminates in the trachea the residual meconium.
sentences.chinese: 以清除氣管內殘留的胎糞。

sentences.english: The full automatic measurement of edge of cord fabric for meridian tyre and discussion on positioning method are introduced?
sentences.chinese: 介紹全自動子午胎簾布裁斷機布邊測量及其定位方法。

sentences.english: Shake the quilt heavily every week to recover the fibre elasticity.
sentences.chinese: 每週將蠶絲被大力抖動，使被胎內部纖維恢復彈性。

sentences.english: He jacked the car and changed the back tire.
sentences.chinese: 他用千斤頂頂起汽車，然後更換後胎。

sentences.english: What is the amniotic fluid and meconium aspiration syndrome?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是羊水與胎糞吸入綜合徵？

sentences.english: It also helps him pass his first bowel movement, which is called meconium .
sentences.chinese: 它還有助於他通過他的首腸運動，這是所謂的胎便。

definition: (in ceramics, lacquerware etc) the base (made of clay, metal, bamboo etc) onto which a glaze, lacquer or other decorative elements are applied
to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
to face childbirth/about to give birth/refers esp. to the onset of regular contractions
